metadata.title: CVE-2022-48661 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:gpio: mockup: Fix potential resource leakage when register a chipIf creation of software node fails, the locally allocated stringarray is left unfreed. Free it on error path.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
